profile.name: Michał Korzeniewski
profile.headline: Senior Data Engineer at Tesco
profile.about: I'm a software engineer with expertise in cloud technologies, distributed systems, and big data. I mostly work with JVM languages such as Scala, Java, and Kotlin. Proficiency in microservices architecture enable me to design and develop robust and scalable software systems. My interests lie in big data and performance optimization. I also keen on various types of data bases and DevOps technologies. I value collaboration and effective communication, which have been key to the success. If you're seeking a dedicated engineer with a passion for innovative solutions, let's connect.

experience.description: Worked on a PPC/PPV Advertising System based on lambda architecture, handling high-throughput and large volumes of data via ETL processing in the cloud and microservices for streaming data.
Microservices-based web application - AI platform and collaboration tool
A distributed system for collecting client survey data from all around the world

education.thesis: Cloud computing security – a secure container orchestration
Computational analysis of flow around levitating oil droplet

awards.title: Participant of the Hackarthon
awards.issuer: Centrum Cyfrowe Foundation, Zacheta - National Gallery of Art and The Society for The Encouragement of Fine Arts

awards.title: Finalist of the hackathon - Kimaton dla Miast
